## Implement Student profile model & DB-backed endpoints

Create a full student profile model and CRUD endpoints to manage student records.

Acceptance criteria:
- DB-backed `Student` model with fields: admission_no, name, dob, class, section, contact, address, parent_info, photo_path, activity assignments
- Endpoints: GET /students, GET /students/{id}, POST /students, PUT /students/{id}, DELETE /students/{id}
- Unit tests for core CRUD operations

Priority: high
